title: MC启动有问题，求解！！！
author: Creegee
txt_content: 我电脑崩溃过一次，重装了系统。系统重装以后发现MC无法正常启动，官方启动器直接打不开，其他启动器或点了启动游戏无任何反应，或启动游戏之后两三秒后游戏自动关闭。重装系统之前一切正常，也不是杀毒软件的问题。

replies.author: Creegee
replies.txt_content: 补充一下，不管安没安forge和liteloader都是这样的情况

replies.author: Creegee
replies.txt_content:
Found cached update
Renaming C:\Users\Administrator\AppData\Roaming\.minecraft\launcher.pack.lzma.new to C:\Users\Administrator\AppData\Roaming\.minecraft\launcher.pack.lzma
Unable to rename - could be on another filesystem, trying copy & delete.
Copy & delete succeeded.
Looking for update
Downloading: https://s3.amazonaws.com/Minecra ... /launcher.pack.lzma
Didn't find an update in time.
Reversing LZMA on C:\Users\Administrator\AppData\Roaming\.minecraft\launcher.pack.lzma to C:\Users\Administrator\AppData\Roaming\.minecraft\launcher.pack
FATAL ERROR: net.minecraft.bootstrap.FatalBootstrapError: Unable to un-lzma: LZMA.LzmaException: LZMA : Data Error
        at net.minecraft.bootstrap.Bootstrap.unpack(Bootstrap.java:146)

Please fix the error and restart.
Exception: java.net.ConnectException: Connection timed out: connect

官方启动器打不开了~~叫我fix error但我不知道怎样修复啊~~

replies.author: 星灬辰
replies.txt_content: 是不是没有安装java，重装后肯定没了，但是玩mc必须得有java

replies.author: z_yan
replies.txt_content: 是不是升级系统了？如果升级到win10要JAVA8

replies.author: xs134134xsxs
replies.txt_content: 装java7、楼主你的mc版本是多少？

replies.author: Creegee
replies.txt_content:
xs134134xsxs 发表于 2016-2-20 11:53
装java7、楼主你的mc版本是多少？
我安装了Java8，mc哪个版本都不能正常启动

replies.author: Creegee
replies.txt_content:
z_yan 发表于 2016-2-20 11:45
是不是升级系统了？如果升级到win10要JAVA8
没有升级系统哦，还是win7

replies.author: gooding300
replies.txt_content:
这个错误是因为正版启动器
无法连接到mojang的服务器获得必须的资源
导致游戏无法启动

请参见
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-334388-1-1.html

replies.author: gooding300
replies.txt_content:
gooding300 发表于 2016-2-20 13:01
这个错误是因为正版启动器
无法连接到mojang的服务器获得必须的资源
导致游戏无法启动
下载 
链接: http://pan.baidu.com/s/1gefo9RP 密码: 98bn 
放进 
C:\Users\Administrator\AppData\Roaming\.minecraft\
应该就可以了w

replies.author: gamerteam
replies.txt_content: 日常服务器被墙而已，挂个VPN就好了

replies.author: He_zimo
replies.txt_content: 你确定你安装了Java？那你可以换其他启动器，把最大内存改为1024试试看！

replies.author: 独行
replies.txt_content: 楼主 java8还有BUG 会闪退 换成java7
